about_the_game:
Astro Sailor is a hand-drawn action-adventure game with rogue-like elements and
a unique gravity-based movement system. On your journey to explore the galaxy,
you’ll meet new friends and foes, discover hidden treasures and face dangerous obstacles.



You wake up stranded in space following the events of a failed teleportation experiment.
To return home, you embark on a journey to gather all lost components
of your teleporter scattered across the asteroid belt.

In Astro Sailor you’ll find:


  • Acrobatic gameplay with the sensation of warped space and gravity
  • Huge procedurally generated worlds to explore
  • Characters from outer space guiding you along your journey
  • Life-saving equipment to collect and upgrade
  • Dangerous obstacles to tackle
  • Frightening aliens to fight or escape from
  • Countless secrets to uncover
  • The well-earned sense of satisfaction from a successful playthrough
